src:
Jak vetar u Engleskoj

02 Nov 2019, 21:30

Jedna žena je danas poginula a linija trajekta izmedju Dovera i Kalea je obustavljena zbog jakih olujnih vetrova u Engleskoj.Policija je saopštila da je žena u šezdesetim godinama poginula kada je drvo palo na njen automobil u okrugu Dorset.Meteorološka služba je izdala upozorenja na kišu i vetar za južnu Englesku i Vels, i upozorila na pljuskove u severnoj Škotskoj.Navedeno je da su danas zabeleženi vetrovi jači od 130 kilometara na sat, i da su oborena brojna stabla. Tako su blokirani neki železnički pravci.Takodje, udari vetra sprečavaju brodove da udju u luku Dover, glavnu putničku vezu Velike Britanije s kontinentalnom Evropom, ili da iz nje izadju.
text:
Strong wind in England

02 Nov 2019, 21:30

One woman was killed today and a ferry line between Dover and Calais was suspended due to heavy storms in England.Police said a woman was killed in the 1960s when a tree fell on her car in Dorset County.Meteorological Service issued rain warnings and winds for southern England and Wales, and warned of showers in northern Scotland. It has been reported that winds higher than 130 kilometers per hour have been recorded today and that many trees have been knocked down. Thus, some rail routes are blocked. Also, wind gusts prevent ships from entering or leaving Dover, the UK's main passenger connection to continental Europe.
